text.tspan: Per capita mismanaged plastic waste vs. GDP per capita
Daily per capita plastic waste which is mismanaged, measured in kilograms per person per day versus gross
domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in 2011 international-$. Mismanaged waste is that which is littered or
inadequately managed. Inadequately managed waste is that which is not formally managed and includes disposal in
Source: Plastic Waste - Jambeck et al. (2015), World Bank
